item.title: API Errors Are Not Protocol Errors
item.description: I visit the programming subreddit from time to time to check for any projects that might be worth looking into, when I stumbled on something interesting. People were making fun of APIs that returned a status code 404 (NOT FOUND) inside the response, while having a HTTP status 200 (OK).
